snippet.title: Victory Heat Rally | Launch Trailer!
snippet.description:
3... 2... 1... GO! Victory Heat Rally is OUT NOW on Steam!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1594060/Victory_Heat_Rally/

Prove yourself in the hottest competition of them all, the VHRC! Choose your racar and prove you've got what it takes to hit the top step of the podium across a whole host of racing events in the VHRC to be named Champion! 

Victory Heat Rally is a retro-inspired arcade racer with gorgeous super scaler graphics and a banging soundtrack. Take to the streets, beaches, forests, air strips and more as you tour the world of VHR and race across tracks that will put your skills to the ultimate test!

Single-player or up to 4-player splitscreen, VHR gives you the chance to finally decide who's the best racer among your friends!
